tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE utility_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT,
    utility_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES utilities_regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
  compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  utility_id UUID NOT NULL,
  regulation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  compliance_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_utility_id FOREIGN KEY (utility_id) REFERENCES utilities (utility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  compliance_id UUID NOT NULL,
  document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_url TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_compliance_id FOREIGN KEY (compliance_id) REFERENCES regulatory_compliance (compliance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE utilities_regulatory_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  utility_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  compliance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  utility_id INT,
  reporting_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  violation_description TEXT,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action_taken VARCHAR(255),
  audit_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)
